page.title: 13RECREATION SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: {Ferndown}children have a wide range of sporting activities to choose from. {Ferndown Sports Centre}provides a swimming pool, squash, badminton and tennis courts, table tennis, weight training, gym, football, judo and rifle clubs. At King George V playing fields there are football and cricket pitches, also a bowling green. {Ferndown Judo Kwai}meet on a Saturday evening. I am a member of the club and enjoy travelling to other parts of the country with them. Judo is a very old self-defence sport from Japan. At{Trickett's Cross}we hope that soon the Council will build a{BMX}track. BMX is one of the fastest-growing sports in Britain today. Strong, light bikes are used on dirt tracks with jumps and steep turns. Bikes can cost up to Â£1200. I hope to make a career out of BMX riding.
